timelineDescription: Gear up for innovation! The team's pre-register preps start now to ensure a smooth functioning of the event.
This is the time to secure your spot in an exhilarating hackathon where ideas come to life and creativity knows no bounds.
This is the time to submit your round 1 projects.
Showcase your vision! Participate in the PPT evaluation round to present your ideas and impress the judges with your innovative solutions.
Prepare for Round 2! Sharpen your ideas and refine your skills to deliver standout solutions that impress the judges.
Submit your solutions for Round 2! Showcase your creativity and technical skills to advance to the final stage of the hackathon.
Round 2 evaluations are underway! Judges will assess your submissions on innovation, feasibility, and impact to select the finalists.
Get ready to innovate on-site! Round 3 is the ultimate offline hackathon where the brightest minds come together to create groundbreaking solutions.
